text: Sergei Eduardovich Prikhodko (; 12 January 1957 â€“ 26 January 2021) was a Russian politician. From May 2013 to May 2018, he was Deputy Prime Minister in Dmitry Medvedev's Cabinet. Kremlin.ru He was the First Deputy Head of the Russian Government Office from 2018 to 2021. TASS Prikhodko died on 26 January 2021 at the age of 64 from amyotrophic lateral sclerosis in Moscow. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:Politicians from Moscow
title: Sergei Eduardovich Prikhodko
